special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
When Xifang Hu enters, noncreature spells cost {2} more to cast until your next turn.
{1}{W}: Demigod
Whenever a creature attacks this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
{4}{W}{W}: God
Distribute a flying, first strike, indestructible, lifelink, vigilance, and +1/+1 counter among any number of creatures you control.
